name: The Rite
description:
"The Rite" is a pixel horror game inspired by horror movies and retro games. You have to survive the abandoned building and all its traps while finding keys and solving puzzles.

Keep your eyes open, hide inside lockers, interact and look everywhere to understand the plot and open the path to freedom!

The game has two endings and was designed to be played in one sitting.

Press A & D move around, W to interact, and SPACEBAR to walk slowly and avoid triggering traps.

Headphone use recommended.
